check.name: url check
check.how_to_perform: Access the application URL and verify if it loads successfully.
check.expected_outcome: URL should load the application homepage without errors.

check.name: db check
check.how_to_perform: Connect to the database and run a sample query to verify connectivity.
check.expected_outcome: Database should respond with correct data within acceptable time limits.

check.name: sys check
check.how_to_perform: Check the system health using monitoring tools or command-line utilities.
check.expected_outcome: System metrics should be within normal operating ranges.

check.name: enc check
check.how_to_perform: Verify if data transmissions are encrypted using SSL/TLS certificates.
check.expected_outcome: All data must be encrypted; no plain-text transmission should occur.

check.name: memory check
check.how_to_perform: Use system tools to monitor memory usage over a period of operation.
check.expected_outcome: Memory consumption should remain stable without major spikes.
